welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Los Alamitos! This charming city is known for its historic landmarks, vibrant culture and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves flights operated by JetBlue and Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport is equipped with customs and immigration facilities for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The largest terminal at LAX, handling all international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at LAX, primarily used by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves international and domestic flights for several airlines including Delta and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Used by several domestic airlines such as American and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Used by several domestic airlines such as Alaska and Frontier.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for several airlines including United and Allegiant.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Used by several domestic airlines such as United and Spirit.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal serves as a hub for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
